projects.title: 724 Events
projects.description: As a freelance front-end developer, I was enlisted by the agency 724events to address bugs on their showcase website. My role was to finalize the project by following the indications left by the previous developer and completing the recipe book to ensure the proper functioning of the site.

projects.title: Nina Carducci - SEO
projects.description: In-depth analysis of photographer Nina Carducci's website, identifying SEO optimization opportunities. Comprehensive optimizations implemented, encompassing performance adjustments, local SEO, metadata for social networks, and accessibility enhancements.
